metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27364 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.11.3.drivers/scsi/scsi_transport_iscsi.c is adversely affected by the ability ofan unprivileged user to craft Netlink messages.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-27364` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-185-generic - 3.13.0-185.236
linux-image-3.13.0-185-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-185.236
linux-image-3.13.0-185-lowlatency - 3.13.0-185.236
linux-image-3.13.0-185-powerpc-e500 - 3.13.0-185.236
linux-image-3.13.0-185-powerpc-e500mc - 3.13.0-185.236
linux-image-3.13.0-185-powerpc-smp - 3.13.0-185.236
linux-image-3.13.0-185-powerpc64-emb - 3.13.0-185.236
linux-image-3.13.0-185-powerpc64-smp - 3.13.0-185.236
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-185-generic - 3.13.0-185.236
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-185-lowlatency - 3.13.0-185.236
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-206-generic - 4.4.0-206.238~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-206-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-206.238~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-206-lowlatency - 4.4.0-206.238~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-206-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-206.238~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-206-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-206.238~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-206-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-206.238~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-206-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-206.238~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-206-generic - 4.4.0-206.238~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-206-lowlatency - 4.4.0-206.238~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1088-aws - 4.4.0-1088.92
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1110-azure - 4.15.0-1110.122~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.13.0-185.236').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-206.238~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1088.92').
linux-azure package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1110.122~14.04.1').
